Hos oss får du mer än en arbetsplats – du blir en del av en gemenskap. Vi har gedigen erfarenhet av att bygga starka team där du får växa tillsammans med kompetenta och engagerade kollegor.

* **Personlig utveckling** – Vi erbjuder en skräddarsydd utvecklingsplan baserad på dina ambitioner och intressen.
* **Trygghet och stabilitet** – Som en del av Knowit, ett etablerat bolag, får du en trygg anställning med generösa förmåner inom pension, försäkring, hälsa och friskvård.
* **Jämställdhet och hållbarhet** – Vi arbetar aktivt för en inkluderande arbetsmiljö och är stolta över vårt mål att vara klimatneutrala.

**Vad vi gör och vad du får jobba med**


På Knowit Connectivity utvecklar vi tekniska lösningar som förändrar världen. Vårt arbete sträcker sig från avancerade 5G-lösningar och uppkopplade fordon till banbrytande utveckling inom defence, automotive och telecom.


Som embeddedutvecklare hos oss arbetar du med C/C++ i Linux-miljöer och RTOS, ofta nära hårdvaran men även högre upp i stacken. Du blir en del av ett stöttande och tekniskt skickligt team där du kan fördjupa dig inom det du brinner för, samtidigt som du bidrar till att skapa framtidens innovativa lösningar.

**Vem vi letar efter**


Vi söker dig som har:

* Minst 5 års erfarenhet av embeddedutveckling
* Stark teknisk grund inom C och C++
* Erfarenhet av Linux-miljöer och RTOS
* Vana av att arbeta nära hårdvara och i mjukvarustacken
* Meriterande erfarenhet från defence, automotive eller telecom
* Teknisk utbildning och starkt intresse för systemutveckling
* Måste kunna genomgå en säkerhetsprövning
* Flytande svenska och engelska i tal och skrift

**Har vi övertygat dig?**


Skicka in din ansökan idag, vi rekryterar löpande! Har du frågor? Tveka inte att höra av dig!

title: Solution Developer
description:
**Role:**

  

* Join during the project’s early execution phase and contribute to the setup and implementation.
* Collaborate with internal agile team, which currently maintains the on-prem solution.
* Translate an existing architectural design into actionable technical solutions and implementations.
* Drive the development of integrations with core systems such as HR, scheduling tools, and reporting systems.
* Work closely with internal solution architects, external specialists, stakeholders, and end users.


You will be entering a well-prepared environment where planning, architecture, and vendor engagement are already in place. However, your ability to take initiative, solve problems, and lead technical efforts will be key to success.

**Essential requirements:**

  

* Hands-on experience with Google Cloud Platform (GCP)
* Good understanding of other cloud platforms such as AWS
* Practical experience with Infrastructure as Code (IaC), preferably using Terraform
* Familiarity with automation and CI/CD pipelines
* Experience building and consuming RESTful APIs
* Working knowledge of authentication mechanisms, including SAML and JWT
* Excellent communication skills and fluency in English

  

  

**Meritorious:**  

* Working knowledge of GCP services such as BigQuery, Dataflow, Cloud Run, and DataForm
* Previous experience working in cloud-native environments or with data platform solutions
* Experience from regulated industries or large-scale enterprise environments
* Swedish language proficiency

  

  

**Please explain how you meet all the requirements** **when applying.**  

  

**Utilization****:** 100**%**  

**Location:** Stockholm  

**Period**: 04-08-2025-31-12-2025  

**Last day to apply**: 05-06-2025  

We present regularly. This means that we sometimes remove the assignements from our website before the final application deadline. If you are interested in an assignement, we recommend that you submit your application as soon as possible.

title: iOS Developer
description:
We now have a new requirement and are looking for a consultant colleague with the qualifications listed below. The position is part of our consulting business, which means you will be employed by us and work either with clients or on internal projects and assignments.

*As part of your application, you may be presented to clients/partners as part of the recruitment process. If selected for the assignment, you will be employed by us and work either with clients or on internal projects and assignments as part of our consulting business.*  

  

**Job Description**

  

* Design, implement and maintain features with a high degree of autonomy for iOS SDK
* Collaborating with other teams and be ready to help our SDK integrators.
* Take an active part in system design
* Work on interesting problems together with talented peers in cross-functional agile teams
* Experiment and learn about design, technology, and processes.
* Ensure a high level of quality, usability, and maintainability of the (reusable) components and code.

  

**Your Profile (Must-have requirements)**

  

* You have a very good knowledge of Objective C and Swift
* You have extensive experience working with Apple’s framework
* Good understanding of the interaction between hardware and software product
* You have experience or interest in working with Bluetooth.
* You always write testable, maintainable code.

  

  

  

**Application deadline:** 09-06-2025  

  

**About Us**  

We currently employ experienced consultants in areas such as System Development, AI, Machine Learning, Testing, Cloud, Infra DevOps, and IT Project Management.  

  

Working at Deploja is something entirely different from working at an ordinary consulting company—and we are really proud of that. So, what makes us unique?  

  

We simply offer more than just a high salary and greater freedom; that’s just the beginning. With us, you’ll find the work environment and opportunities you deserve. Welcome to Deploja, where the grass is indeed greener!  


  



**Vi erbjuder dig följande, Valet är ditt!**


Exciting assignments with our many clients. We focus on long-term projects, which gives you the opportunity to create value for the client while also developing yourself.


A secure monthly salary – together we’ll agree on a base salary depending on your assignments.


Company car – we encourage you to choose an electric car for a more sustainable future.


Occupational pension and great opportunities for salary conversion.


Vacation – Would you like more than 30 days of vacation, perhaps 60 days?


Private health insurance, accident insurance, and life insurance for increased security.


Skills development – you set your own budget and choose the training you wish to attend.


Quality of life – Are you struggling to balance everyday life and wish to work a little less while still earning as much, if not more?

*We handle applications continuously, and due to the high workload, it's especially important to include a short motivation for the position, explaining how you meet the requirements.*

title: Global Sales Developer
description:
### **About the role**


Are you a driven person with a passion for complex sales and building long-term business relationships? Do you thrive on creating new connections and finding innovative solutions? Then you might be the Global Sales Developer we’re looking for to strengthen our team at Instabee! We are now looking for a proactive and entrepreneurial person who, with creativity and perseverance, can target and win over strategic key clients.

### **Some of the things you will do**

* Strategically identify and approach a select group of high-potential companies, focusing on building deep, long-term relationships rather than quick wins.
  
* Develop and implement creative strategies to reach decision-makers and initiate meaningful dialogues.
  
* Navigate and drive complex business processes with longer sales cycles, turning leads into lasting partnerships.
  
* Show strong initiative and a solution-oriented mindset by quickly analyzing client needs and presenting innovative solutions that create clear value.
  
* Establish trustful and sustainable relationships with key stakeholders at prospective clients, laying the foundation for long-term successful collaborations.
  

### **Your future team**


You will join a fast-moving and ambitious business development team that focuses on expanding our strategic client base. The team is collaborative, creative, and highly motivated, with a passion for challenging the status quo and finding new ways to grow the business. Together, we aim to push boundaries and drive Instabox’s continued success across Europe.

### **What We’re Looking For**

* Experience working with complex sales and handling deals involving multiple stakeholders.
  
* Perseverance and an understanding of long sales cycles, knowing that success takes time and strategic focus.
  
* A proactive, self-starter attitude with the ability to see opportunities and actively drive the process forward.
  
* A solution-oriented mindset, enjoying finding unique and effective ways to reach prospective clients.
  
* Strong drive to secure the first meeting and creatively break through barriers to connect with potential partners.
  

### **The cherry on top**

* Experience working in fast-growing or scale-up environments.
  
* Strong network within relevant industries or key verticals.

  

If this is you, then we can’t wait to meet you!

### **What you’ll get**


We can promise you that you will be challenged, develop your skills, and have the opportunity to work with truly amazing and competent colleagues. If you like change and want to set new processes and ways of working — this is the place for you!


Of course, we have all the necessary and standard benefits in place, but in addition, we also offer:


Sky-High Office: Modern and newly renovated with a 360-degree view around Stockholm.  

Puppy Friendly: Bring your dog to work — we’ve got a whole floor for our furry friends!  

Fun & Games: Ping pong, shuffleboard, foosball, and even a karaoke room for your leisure time.  

Parental Pay for Six Months: Step away from work and provide the best care and love to your little one.  

A Day Off on Your Birthday: Enjoy your birthday to the fullest with a day off each year!  

Flexible Hours: Hybrid setup with working hours that adapt to your lifestyle.  

Wednesday Tech Breakfasts: Fuel your midweek with tech talks and tasty bites.  

Tech Demos: Dive into the latest innovations with our regular tech showcases.  

Modern Tech Stack: Work with cutting-edge technology every day.


### **Diversity & inclusion**


Diversity and inclusion are very important to us, and we are committed to creating an inclusive work environment. We want to be a workplace where everyone’s perspectives and opinions are valued, and we are dedicated to creating opportunities for all employees to thrive and reach their full potential.


#LI-ML1

title: Senior Backend Developer
description:
**About Enity Bank Group**  

Enity is a challenger in the Nordic mortgage market, choosing to see the potential in people. Through inclusive, yet sustainable and responsible mortgage lending, we play an important role in supporting those who are often excluded by traditional banks.


Since 2005, we have enabled financial empowerment for our customers, providing them access to the housing market or opportunities to get back on track through remortgage as well as offering high-yield savings accounts.


Our brand portfolio includes Bluestep Bank, Bank2, and 60plusbanken. Together they serve customers across Sweden, Norway, and Finland, joined in a dedication to make banking simple, forward-looking, and accessible for more people.  

  

**About the role**  

We’re looking for a senior developer with a strong backend profile to help us modernize banking technology and create seamless digital experiences for our customers. If you enjoy solving complex problems and working with modern tech stacks, this is the role for you!  

  

**What you’ll be doing**  

As part of our cross-functional team, you’ll design, develop, and maintain secure, scalable applications for core banking. A key part of the role is modernizing legacy systems and transitioning them into a cloud-based, microservice-oriented architecture. You’ll collaborate closely with product owners, designers, and fellow developers to continuously improve our platforms and deliver high-quality user experiences.  

  

**Tech stack**  

Our tech stack includes:

* .NET Core and C# for backend development
* SQL and stored procedures for data management
* RabbitMQ, messaging patterns, and REST APIs for integration and communication
* Azure, Azure DevOps, Kubernetes, and Docker for cloud infrastructure and deployment
* Angular, TypeScript, and ASP.NET MVC/Razor for frontend and server-side rendering


While the role is backend-focused, you’ll occasionally interact with the frontend and infrastructure layers.  

  

**Who you are**  

We’re looking for someone with extensive experience in backend development using .NET and cloud technologies, ideally 5+ years. You are passionate about clean code, scalable architecture, and robust solutions. You enjoy collaborating, sharing knowledge, and contributing to a learning culture. Staying curious and keeping up with modern development practices comes naturally to you.  

  

**We offer**  

We offer an inclusive and collaborative culture where innovation is truly encouraged. With a hybrid work model (three days in the office and two remote), you’ll have the flexibility to balance work and life. We also provide great opportunities for career growth, including access to training and professional development. Plus, you’ll get to work with a modern tech stack on exciting challenges in the banking industry.  

  

**Sound interesting?**  

We would be happy to see your application as soon as possible, as the selection is ongoing. Please note that a valid work permit for Sweden is required for this position.

 **Please note that this recruitment is managed by our external partner Safemind.** ***All*** **applications are therefore submitted via Safemind's application form.**

title: Systemutvecklare inom produktutveckling och automation...
description:
**Nethouse växer! Vi söker dig som är systemutvecklare inom produktutveckling och automation, med känsla för helhet och leverans!**


Med djup expertis inom identitetshantering (IAM), integration och säkerhet är Nethouse ett av Sveriges mest kunniga bolag inom området. Nu förstärker vi teamet i Göteborg med en utvecklare som vill arbeta i teknikens framkant med system som gör skillnad på riktigt.


Vill du vara en del av ett företag där vi bygger smarta lösningar – och dessutom har kul medan vi gör det?

**Om rollen**


I rollen som utvecklare hos oss på Nethouse blir du en viktig kugge i vårt identitetsteam, där vi arbetar med automation, användarhantering och säkerhet i komplexa IT-miljöer. Du kommer framför allt att jobba med vidareutveckling och anpassning av vårt verktyg SMARTCatalogue – en lösning som hanterar behörigheter, accesser och användarlivscykler hos våra kunder.


Vi söker dig som gillar att få saker att fungera i praktiken, och som har en förmåga att lösa riktiga problem med rätt teknik. Fokus ligger på både backend och frontend, och mycket av arbetet sker i nära dialog med kund och tekniska kollegor.

**Du kommer främst att jobba med:**

* Backendutveckling i C#/.NET
* Frontend i Angular
* Automationslogik via PowerShell
* Arbete mot SQL för datalagring
* Integrationer och deployment i hybrida IT-miljöer – on-prem och moln
* Samarbete i ett prestigelöst, kunnigt och hjälpsamt team

**Vem är du?**


Vi tror att du är en nyfiken och lösningsorienterad utvecklare som trivs i gränslandet mellan teknik, affär och säkerhet. Du gillar att arbeta nära kund och du värdesätter struktur, tydlig leverans och att göra jobbet tillsammans.


Du har erfarenhet av:

* C# och Angular i produktionsprojekt
* PowerShell eller annan scriptbaserad automation
* SQL och databashantering
* Gärna förståelse för IAM-lösningar, access management eller infrastruktur
* Svenska och engelska i tal och skrift

**Passar vi dig?**


Vi är ett varmt, engagerat och professionellt gäng med mycket på gång, inte minst i Göteborg. Vår kultur och våra medarbetare är vår viktigaste tillgång och vi arbetar med kunden i fokus. På Nethouse har vi en arbetsmiljö där du kan utvecklas både personligt och tekniskt. Du får möjlighet till ett flexibelt och självständigt arbete med stor frihet att forma din egen vardag.


Tillsammans utgör vi en prestigelös och öppen arbetsplats med hög trivsel, där vi delar med oss av kunskaper och har nära till både skratt och beslut.

**Vi erbjuder dig:**

* En hybrid arbetsmiljö där du jobbar från vårt kontor i Göteborg – men med frihet att arbeta hemma
* Individuell lönesättning, förmånligt pensionspaket och löneväxling
* Friskvårdsbidrag, 30 dagars semester, förmånscykel och balans i vardagen
* Kollegor som brinner för teknik och gör det lilla extra för att hjälpa varandra
* Möjligheten att arbeta med system som faktiskt gör skillnad, både för kund och samhälle


Intresserad?


Vi jobbar med löpande urval, så skicka gärna in din ansökan så snart som möjligt.  

Har du frågor om rollen, kontakta gärna Mathilde Branth på mathilde.branth@nethouse.se.

**Om oss på Nethouse**


Vi är specialister på robust moln- och IT-infrastruktur och tar hand om system och applikationer med höga krav på tillgänglighet och säkerhet, även i högt säkerhetsklassade miljöer. Med våra konsulter och kunddedikerade team får kunden en verksamhetsanpassad leverans och närhet till de specialister som kan just deras verksamhet och IT-miljö.


Nethouse startade sin verksamhet 1998 och är idag ca 130 medarbetare som jobbar på något av våra kontor i Örebro, Karlstad, Karlskoga, Göteborg och Sundsvall.


Nethouse är en del av den börsnoterade digitaliseringskoncernen CombinedX.

title: Mjukvaruutvecklare inom försvarsindustrin
description:
Brinner du för mjukvaruutveckling och har en relevant utbildning i grunden? – Då kan detta vara ditt nästa karriärsteg!

 **Om företaget:**


Vår kund är ett ledande teknikkonsultbolag som verkar genom hela utvecklingscykeln – från systemering, arkitektur och design till implementation och verifiering. Här kombineras djup teknisk expertis med glädje och en trivsam arbetsmiljö. Företaget är globalt med huvudkontor i Sverige och spelar en avgörande roll i att stärka flera nationers försvarsförmåga. Som konsult får du möjlighet att arbeta inom olika branscher såsom industri, försvar, medtech, fordon och telekom.


Tjänsten är en direktrekrytering vilket innebär att rekryteringsprocessen sker genom Futuria People men du kommer anställas direkt hos kund.

**Om rollen:**

  

I rollen som mjukvaruutvecklare får du arbeta med avancerad mjukvaruutveckling inom olika teknikområden. Det finns ingen specifik uppdragsbeskrivning – istället matchas din kompetens och dina intressen med de projekt och behov som bäst passar din profil. Uppdragen kan innebära arbete med bland annat inbyggda system, IT-system, övergripande systemarkitektur samt utveckling i C#, .NET och andra teknologier.


Dina arbetsuppgifter kan bland annat inkludera:

* Design, utveckling och testning av mjukvarusystem
* Systemintegration och optimering
* Arbete i både team och självständigt med komplexa tekniska lösningar
* Möjlighet att bidra i hela utvecklingskedjan – från koncept till färdig produkt


Du kan komma att arbeta antingen på företagets egna kontor eller ute hos kund, beroende på projekt och dina preferenser.

 **Du erbjuds:**

* **Spännande projekt** – Arbeta i ett brett spektrum av branscher och teknologier där du bidrar till hållbara och säkra lösningar
* **Skräddarsydda roller** – Din roll anpassas efter dina intressen, kunskaper och karriärmål tack vare företagets stora och varierande kundbas
* **Karriärutveckling** – Möjlighet att utvecklas till en teamledarroll eller andra avancerade positioner när du är redo för nästa steg
* **Hållbar arbetsmiljö** – Ett företag som värdesätter balans mellan arbete och privatliv, där långsiktig utveckling och välmående prioriteras.

**Vi ser gärna att du:**

  

* Har en ingenjörsbakgrund inom exempelvis systemvetenskap, datateknik eller liknande

* Har erfarenhet av programmering i C#, .NET eller andra relevanta teknologier
* Är flexibel och öppen för olika typer av uppdrag

* Placering: Göteborg

title: Backend Developer - Java
description:
We now have a new requirement and are looking for a consultant colleague with the qualifications listed below. The position is part of our consulting business, which means you will be employed by us and work either with clients or on internal projects and assignments.

*As part of your application, you may be presented to clients/partners as part of the recruitment process. If selected for the assignment, you will be employed by us and work either with clients or on internal projects and assignments as part of our consulting business.*  

  

**Job Description**  

This is a pure backend and works primarily with Java and Kotlin.
  

  

**Your Profile (Must-have requirements)**

  

* Practical experience of developing back-end services in Java and/or Kotlin.
* Focus on delivery, attention to detail and quality of the end result.
* Practical experience of designing, building and maintaining distributed systems in a cloud-native environment.
* Experience working in an agile development team, using common tools like Jira and GitHub.
* Examples of growing yourself and/or people around you – learning from others and sharing your knowledge, experiences and opinions.
* Experience in cloud infrastructure (we primarily use AWS). Get bonus points if you also have...
* Familiarity with FinTech industry payment transactions.

  

  

**Application deadline:** 09-06-2025  

  

**About Us**  

We currently employ experienced consultants in areas such as System Development, AI, Machine Learning, Testing, Cloud, Infra DevOps, and IT Project Management.  

  

Working at Deploja is something entirely different from working at an ordinary consulting company—and we are really proud of that. So, what makes us unique?  

  

We simply offer more than just a high salary and greater freedom; that’s just the beginning. With us, you’ll find the work environment and opportunities you deserve. Welcome to Deploja, where the grass is indeed greener!  


  



**Vi erbjuder dig följande, Valet är ditt!**


Exciting assignments with our many clients. We focus on long-term projects, which gives you the opportunity to create value for the client while also developing yourself.


A secure monthly salary – together we’ll agree on a base salary depending on your assignments.


Company car – we encourage you to choose an electric car for a more sustainable future.


Occupational pension and great opportunities for salary conversion.


Vacation – Would you like more than 30 days of vacation, perhaps 60 days?


Private health insurance, accident insurance, and life insurance for increased security.


Skills development – you set your own budget and choose the training you wish to attend.


Quality of life – Are you struggling to balance everyday life and wish to work a little less while still earning as much, if not more?

*We handle applications continuously, and due to the high workload, it's especially important to include a short motivation for the position, explaining how you meet the requirements.*

title: Learning Developer & Facilitator – Data Landscape
description:
**Program Context**
-------------------

  

Hyper Island’s Data Analyst Program is a 90 week full-time program that fosters multilingual data professionals who can thrive in the intersections between **data, strategy, leadership, collaboration, and stakeholder management**. Learners graduate with a foundation spanning SQL, Python, Tableau, BI, statistics, data engineering and governance, blended with Hyper Island’s signature teamwork and self‑leadership methodology and experience based learning, The Hyper Island Way.


Shorter upskill courses (Data Analyst Upskill Course) offer a hands-on introduction to data analytics, covering industry insights, key data roles, and similar tools like in the longer program. It is designed for people who want to better understand data to inform decisions and communicate effectively. It is a solid complement to their current professional role.

  


**Role Purpose**
----------------

  

This is a cross-functional role that blends learning design, facilitation, and data fluency to raise program quality.


In this role, you will combine strong learning design and facilitation skills with an understanding of the learner and industry data landscape. Your work will directly enhance the learner experience, improve course-level NPS, and increase the program’s appeal to both industry partners and future applicants.  

  

You will focus primarily on the Data Analyst and Data Analyst Upskill programs but the role is not limited to that and you will collaborate closely with the team of Learning Developer & Facilitators across all our programs.  



**Key Outcomes (Success Metrics)**
----------------------------------

* Increased average course rating across courses versus previous cohorts.
* Increased learner and course NPS versus previous cohorts.
* Diversity and depth of Stockholm‑based expert network supporting the program.
* Learners feel safe in their learning journey and they know what is expected of them.
* Students are equipped to take ownership and lead the direction of their learning.

**Core Responsibilities**
-------------------------

 **Curriculum & Experience Design**

* Map course goals (based on curriculum) to engaging, experiential learning journeys; iterate briefs, assessments and resources.
* Embed Hyper Island methodologies (learn‑by‑doing, reflection, feedback loops) across onsite and online components.

 **Facilitation & Learner Coaching**

* Lead and facilitate campus‑first sessions in Stockholm (online activities as needed).
* Coach diverse adult learners (career‑changers, recent grads, up‑skillers) in both technical and professional skills.

  

**Casting Support & Stakeholder Liaison (in partnership with Casting Manager)**

* Leverage your network to source Sweden‑based data professionals, guest lecturers and project partners.
* Brief and onboard external experts; ensure seamless alignment with learning outcomes and course logistics.
  

**Program Operations & Continuous Improvement**

  

* Collaborate closely with involved Industry Experts to ensure each part of the program builds progressively and that feedback loops are established between collaborators from course to course.
* Own delivery plans, schedules, and logistics; troubleshoot in real time.
* Collect and analyse feedback; run rapid iterations to enhance quality.
* Leverage the collaboration with the Program Steering Committee.
  

**Thought Leadership & Community Building**


Share insights on data‑landscape trends, responsible AI, and emerging tooling with the School Team and wider community.  

* 

**Essential Competencies & Experience**
---------------------------------------

 **Learning Design & Facilitation**


+2 years or equivalent experience designing and delivering adult or professional learning; experience in experiential, project‑based approaches; skilled in group dynamics, psychological safety and feedback frameworks.

**Data‑Landscape Fluency**


Broad understanding and big picture perspective across Excel, SQL, Python, BI dashboards, cloud data platforms, data governance & ethics; able to translate complex concepts for non‑experts as well as how to draw conclusions in this field based on market insights.


**Casting & Partnership Skills**


Existing network in Swedish/Stockholm data scene; confidence briefing external experts. Actively seeking opportunities and avenues for collaborations that can enhance the learning experience.


**Agile Project Management**


Sprint planning, Kanban, risk mitigation in a fast‑paced academic setting.

**Digital Collaboration Tools**


Miro, Google Workspace, Classter, Slack; comfortable facilitating hybrid cohorts. DataCamp is also beneficial.  



**Personal Attributes**
-----------------------

* **Doing & Being** mindset – proactively experiment, reflect and role‑model Hyper Island values of curiosity, courage and self‑leadership.
* Passion for empowering others and leading change through action.
* Inclusive, culturally intelligent collaborator who thrives in creative and fast phased environments.

**Why Hyper Island?**
---------------------

* Autonomy to experiment, reflect and lead the change—the Hyper Island Way.
* A passionate School Team of doers who believe team is everything.

Clear runway to turn this prototype role into a permanent one if the impact is right.  
* 

**Practical Details**
---------------------

* **Location:** Stockholm campus (minimum 4 days per week on‑site).
* **Contract:** 16‑month parental‑leave cover, August 2025 – December 2026; strong possibility of permanent extension based on prototype success.
* **Seniority & Salary Band:** Mid‑level; SEK 37 000 – 40 000 per month
* **Start Date:** August 2025 (or as soon as possible)
* **Reporting Line:** Director of Learning Development & Facilitation.
* **Visa/Relocation:** No sponsorship provided; candidates must already have the right to work in Sweden.
* **Apply by June 15 2025** with CV and portfolio of designed/facilitated learning experiences (or other equivalent experiences). Interviews will happen asynchronously and the position may be filled before the application period has ended—start date August.
  

*Hyper Island celebrates diversity and is committed to equal opportunity. We encourage applications from all backgrounds who share our passion for learning by doing.*

  

**About Hyper Island**
----------------------

  

Hyper Island designs transformative learning experiences to enable growth for individuals and for businesses. Through our global network of schools and business services, we put people at the heart of innovation, leadership and change for success today and tomorrow.

title: Fullstackutvecklare till miljöteknik-startup
description:
**Om tjänsten**  

Vår samarbetspartner söker nu en fullstackutvecklare som vill vara med och bygga användarvänliga gränssnitt baserade på data från IoT-enheter. Backend är i stor utsträckning outsourcat via Google Firebase, vilket gör frontendutvecklingen både central och kreativ. Du kommer få ett stort inflytande i tekniska beslut och jobba nära produkt- och UX-design, i en miljö där din tekniska nyfikenhet och problemlösningsförmåga är avgörande.

**Dina framtida arbetsuppgifter**  

I rollen blir du en nyckelperson i utvecklingen av produkten – från datavisualisering till användarupplevelse. Du jobbar i tätt samarbete med design- och embeddedteamet.


Exempel på arbetsuppgifter:

* Bygga grafiska gränssnitt för att visualisera data från IoT-enheter
* Integrera mot Firebase och andra molntjänster
* Ansvara för frontendarkitektur och tekniska vägval
* Delta i hela utvecklingscykeln – från idé till lansering
* Samarbeta med design, maskinteknik och embeddedutveckling
* Identifiera och åtgärda buggar samt förbättra prestanda

**Vi söker dig som**  

Har erfarenhet av att arbeta i startupmiljö och är van att ta ansvar, även när direktiv och specifikationer är knapphändiga. Du har ett tydligt driv och ser inga problem i att själv fylla i luckor.

**Krav:**

* Tidigare erfarenhet av IoT.
* Minst 2–3 års erfarenhet från en startupmiljö, alternativt 5+ års erfarenhet.
* Stark kompetens inom JavaScript.
* Förståelse för helheten – helst erfarenhet från fullstack, även om fokus är frontend.

**Meriterande:**

* Vana att arbeta med moderna ramverk och molntjänster, t.ex. Vue, React, Firebase
* Svenska språkkunskaper, men engelska räcker.
* Aktiv GitHub eller portfolio med egna projekt


Du är nyfiken, självgående och lösningsorienterad. Du trivs i en miljö med högt tempo, där du får påverka mycket och vara en central del av utvecklingen. Du vill samarbeta i ett team snarare än att arbeta helt på distans, och gillar känslan av att bygga något från grunden.

**Övrig information**

* **Start:** Efter semestrarna, för att ge dig en bra start på din nya karriär.
* **Plats:** Göteborg.
* **Omfattning:** Heltid, med flexibilitet i arbetsplats och arbetstider.
* **Anställningsform:** Tillsvidare med inledande provanställning.

**Om kunden**  

Vår kund är ett teknikdrivet startupbolag som utvecklar produkter inom miljöteknik. De kombinerar hårdvarunära IoT-lösningar med datainsamling och användarvänliga gränssnitt, med syftet att bidra till ett mer hållbart samhälle. Teamet är tvärfunktionellt och består av produktdesigner, maskiningenjör, embeddedutvecklare och UX-specialist – med ett gemensamt mål att skapa teknik som gör skillnad.

**Om Wrknest**  

På Wrknest gör vi inte som alla andra. Vi tror på att hela tiden våga se nya möjligheter och tänka nytt. När vi startade var det för att utmana gamla sätt att rekrytera på. Vi lever i en tid av snabb digital utveckling. Kunskap behöver förnyas kontinuerligt för att vara aktuell. Därför gäller det att kunna ställa om snabbt. Det här gör att vi inte enbart tittar på kandidatens CV vid en rekrytering. Istället ser vi till den samlade potentialen och erbjuder individanpassad upskilling. På så vis kan vi snabbt matcha de kunskapsbehov som finns just nu. Läs mer på www.wrknest.se.

title: LPP Developer
description:
**Join our Team**
-----------------

 **About the Opportunity:**

  

Step into the future with Baseband Infrastructure (BBI), where innovation meets excellence and technology knows no boundaries.At Baseband Infrastructure (BBI), we deliver a state-of-the-art Operating System (OS) and Software Development Kit (SDK) to Ericsson software developers creating high-performance System-on-Chip (SoC) solutions for RAN products.

  

LPP, our Lightweight Processing Platform, is the core OS for 4G/5G/Next-G baseband Digital Signal Processing powered by a Many-core platform in BBI.We are seeking a motivated developer to join the LPP team based in Stockholm. You will be responsible for new LPP features study / design / implementation, and maintain existing features (E.g., new chipsets studies, boot loader/script, timer server, memory management, thread scheduler, crash dump analysis, colossus drivers, real time trace, CDA module etc.) You will be working closely with the Hardware, Baseband, and Radio Software teams on cross-functional projects.This role involves troubleshooting, technical investigations and customer support, offering a dynamic opportunity at the intersection of software development and system-level problem solving.

  

At BBI, we follow agile methodologies, emphasize customer focus, and empower self-organized teams. We work closely with internal Ericsson customers, prioritizing teamwork, communication, continuous improvement, equal opportunities, and collaboration, while adhering to Ericsson core values—respect, professionalism, perseverance, and integrity.

 **What you will do**

* Join an agile development team dedicated to advancing the Lightweight Processing Platform (LPP)
* Engage in all phases of LPP development, including requirement analysis, systemization, prototyping, design, testing, integration, troubleshooting, and deployment
* Enhance LPP quality by implementing diverse continuous integration projects in Jenkins, such as the CDA test framework, daily smoke Atest, and LPP SQR tests
* Collaborate effectively with team members, other BBI design teams, and BBI users globally, providing support to external users including Baseband and Radio developers
* Commit to continuous learning and application of new technologies relevant to BBI, such as cloud computing, secure coding, and AI/ML (including GenAI)

 **Skills you bring:**

* Bachelor’s / Master’s degree in computer science, electrical engineering, or a related field
* Proven experience in embedded real-time software development, with strong proficiency in C/C++ programming, particularly in multi-process/multi-threaded application development
* Solid python programming skills
* Strong understanding of many-core computer architectures and real-time systems
* Knowledge in Digital Signal Processing theory, applications, and familiarity with 3GPP standards
* Experience working in a continuous integration (CI) environment, with tools such as Jenkins or similar
* Familiarity with Agile methodologies and enthusiasm for working in an agile organization
* Excellent communication skills in English
* Collaborative, open, and innovative mindset

 **Preferred skills:**

* Experience with many core platforms or parallel programming, as well as baseband/radio application software development
* Good programming skills in multi-core platform assembly
* Troubleshooting skills, including both post-mortem and runtime debugging
* Proficiency in performance analysis of embedded computing systems
**Why join Ericsson?**


At Ericsson, you´ll have an outstanding opportunity. The chance to use your skills and imagination to push the boundaries of what´s possible. To build solutions never seen before to some of the world’s toughest problems. You´ll be challenged, but you won’t be alone. You´ll be joining a team of diverse innovators, all driven to go beyond the status quo to craft what comes next.  

  

**What happens once you apply?**


Click Here to find all you need to know about what our typical hiring process looks like.


Encouraging a diverse and inclusive organization is core to our values at Ericsson, that's why we champion it in everything we do. We truly believe that by collaborating with people with different experiences we drive innovation, which is essential for our future growth. We encourage people from all backgrounds to apply and realize their full potential as part of our Ericsson team. Ericsson is proud to be an Equal Opportunity Employer. learn more.

**Primary country and city:** Sweden || Stockholm

title: Senior backendutvecklare - Node.js
description:
Vill du vara en del av ett företag där din tekniska expertis gör en verklig skillnad? Som senior Node.js-utvecklare får du möjligheten att vara med i utvecklingen av robusta och skalbara system som driver affärskritiska applikationer. Du kommer att arbeta med Node.js, JavaScript, TypeScript, Express framework, molnlösningar (AWS, GCP, Azure), API-design, microservices och containerbaserade arkitekturer (Docker, Kubernetes).


**Vad förväntar vi oss av dig?**

* Teknisk expertis: Ungefär 5 års erfarenhet av backendutveckling, molnbaserade system och erfarenhet av Infrastructure as Code.
* Kommunikationsförmåga: Du kan effektivt kommunicera komplexa tekniska lösningar till olika intressenter.
* Problemlösare: Du har en analytisk förmåga och kan tänka strategiskt för att hitta de bästa lösningarna.
* Ledarskap: Du är en informell ledare som inspirerar och stöttar dina kollegor.
* Teamspelare: Du trivs med att arbeta både självständigt och i team.
* Språk: Du är flytande i svenska och engelska, i både tal och skrift.

**Arbetsplats**  

Arbetsplatsen för den här rollen är Malmö med omnejd.


**Om Devoteam**  

Hos oss värderar vi medarbetarnas trivsel och utveckling högt. Vi har byggt en arbetskultur där människor känner sig inspirerade, utmanade och trygga. Vi tror att när du trivs och växer, så gör även våra lösningar det.


Vi är ett ledande IT-konsultföretag med en stark förankring i Malmös tech-community, både som Devoteam och f.d .Jayway. Vi är engagerade i att skapa långsiktiga relationer med både kunder och medarbetare. Vi drivs av en passion för teknik och innovation, och erbjuder skräddarsydda lösningar för företag inom en rad olika branscher. Bland våra initiativ kan nämnas Øredev , en av Skandinaviens största utvecklarkonferenser, som vi var med och grundade.


**Förmåner och praktisk information:**

* Kontinuerligt lärande: Vi stöder kontinuerligt lärande med kompetensgrupper varannan vecka, deltagande på Øredev och löpande kompetensdagar för din professionella utveckling. Du har möjlighet att ta certifikat med någon av våra partners (AWS, Azure, GCP).
* Ledighet och pension: Vi erbjuder 30 dagars semester, kompletterande föräldraledighetsersättning och tjänstepension enligt ITP1.
* Hälsa och välbefinnande: Självklara förmåner som friskvårdsbidrag, tillgång till företagshälsovård, hälsokontroller och lunchyoga på kontoret.
* Verktyg och utrustning: Du väljer själv de verktyg du behöver för att leverera och trivas i din arbetsmiljö.

**Ansökan**  

För att ansöka, vänligen skicka din ansökan via länken nedan. Vi uppmuntrar tidiga ansökningar eftersom vi granskar dem löpande.


För eventuella frågor, kontakta Sanna Ekelöf, vår rekryterare, på sanna.ekelof@devoteam.com. Sanna kommer att vara din primära kontaktperson under hela rekryteringsprocessen.

title: Junior Java Developer
description:

Are you a passionate Java Developer eager to contribute to innovative projects and collaborate with talented teams? We're looking for you to join our dynamic development team!

### **Key Responsibilities:**

* **Develop & Innovate**: Engage in all phases of the software development lifecycle—plan, code, test, and deploy!
* **Code Quality**: Write efficient, scalable, and top-notch code that meets project specifications.
* **Team Collaboration**: Work closely with other developers, testers, and project managers to create seamless solutions.
* **Tech Exploration**: Stay updated with the latest Java technologies and best practices.
* **Optimize Performance**: Ensure high performance, responsiveness, and reliability of applications.

### **What You Bring:**

* **Experience**: 1-3 years in Java development.

	+ Proficiency in **Java SE/EE** and object-oriented programming.
	+ Hands-on experience with frameworks like **Spring (Spring MVC, Spring Boot)** and **JSF**.
	+ Strong familiarity with **Java**, **Spring Framework**, and **JSF**.

* **Additional Skills**:

Ready to make a difference with your Java skills? **Apply now** and be part of our tech journey!

title: Lead CRM Developer
description:
We are seeking a highly skilled and experienced Lead Dynamics 365 CRM Developer to join our innovative team. The Lead CRM Developer will be responsible for delivering cutting-edge solutions and providing exceptional service to our users and management.

**Responsibilities:**

* **Lead the customization** and configuration of Dynamics 365 CRM modules, including Sales, Customer Service, and Customer Engagement.
* Customize and configure Dynamics 365 modules to meet business requirements.
* Develop and maintain plugins, workflows, and custom integrations using C# and JavaScript.
* Collaborate with business analysts and stakeholders to gather and analyze requirements.
* Provide technical leadership and mentorship to junior developers.
* Ensure the quality and performance of CRM solutions through rigorous testing and best practices.
* Troubleshoot and resolve complex technical issues related to Dynamics 365.
* Stay updated with the latest Dynamics 365 features and industry trends.
* Document technical designs, processes, and configurations.
* Work closely with project managers and stakeholders to ensure timely delivery of projects.

**Qualifications:**

* Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or a related field.
* Minimum of **6 years** of experience in Dynamics 365 CRM development.
* Implementation of at least 3 Microsoft Dynamics 365 complete project cycles.
* Strong proficiency in C#, JavaScript, HTML5, and CSS and related technologies and JavaScript frameworks.
* **Extensive experience** with Dynamics 365 customization and configuration.
* Strong experience in Web APIs, Client APIs, and plugin development.
* Excellent knowledge of Power Platform, including PowerApps, Power Automate, and Power BI.
* Excellent problem-solving skills and attention to detail.
* Strong communication and interpersonal skills.

title: Senior Java Developer
description:
Jadeer is hiring on behalf of one of our clients in Egypt, our client is one of the leaders in software industry  

  

  



**Job Title: Senior Java Developer**  

  

**Java Developer roles typically focus on designing, developing, and maintaining software applications. Responsibilities often include contributing to all phases of the software development lifecycle, writing efficient code, and ensuring design compliance with specifications. Developers are expected to work collaboratively with other engineers to produce high-quality, testable code and support continuous improvement by exploring new technologies and best practices.**

 **Responsibilities:**

* **Software Development Lifecycle Participation**: Contribute to all phases of the software development lifecycle, including planning, coding, testing, and deployment.
* **Code Development**: Write efficient, scalable, and high-quality code that adheres to design specifications and best practices in software development.
* **System Design and Analysis**: Analyze user requirements to define functional specifications and contribute to system design and architecture decisions.
* **Testing and Debugging**: Develop and execute test cases, identify bugs, and troubleshoot issues to maintain code reliability and performance.
* **Collaboration**: Work closely with other team members, including developers, testers, and project managers, to ensure cohesive and aligned software solutions.
* **Documentation**: Document code, processes, and development practices for future maintenance and upgrades.
* **Performance Optimization**: Monitor and optimize application performance, ensuring high responsiveness and efficiency.
* **Technology Exploration**: Stay updated on new Java technologies, frameworks, and best practices to continually improve and refine the development process.
* **Code Review**: Participate in code reviews to maintain code quality standards and share knowledge with other team members.
* **Support and Maintenance**: Provide ongoing support and maintenance for applications, handling updates, enhancements, and performance tuning as required.

 **Qualifications:**

* + Experience: 3 to 5 years
* + Strong understanding of Java SE/EE
	+ Object-oriented programming, and familiarity with frameworks like Spring and JSF Proficiency in SQL and relational databases
	+ Experience with web frameworks (e.g., Spring MVC or JSF) is also highly valued

**Benefits:**

  

* Competitive salary.
* Health insurance.
* Professional development opportunities.
* Flexible working hours.
* Collaborative and supportive work environment.

**Working Conditions:**


Working Hours: 9-6 (Sun-Thursday


Working Model: Hybrid


At Jadeer, we value diversity and equal opportunity. We welcome applicants from all backgrounds and experiences.

title: E-Learning Developer
description:
**Join one of the leading** **Translation & Localization** **Companies in the world!** **Future Group** **Company is leading the localization market since 1994 with global subsidiaries serving North & Latin Americas, Asia, Europe and MEA**


We are looking for a highly motivated and skilled **E-Content Develope**r to join our team. The successful candidate will work in a fast-paced environment, developing engaging and interactive e-learning content using a range of software tools such as Storyline Articulate 360 and Adobe After Effects.

**Responsibilities:**



* Develop interactive/engaging e-learning content that meets project requirements using Articulate Storyline.


* Create multimedia assets such as graphics, audio, and animated video elements to enhance course material.


* Work collaboratively with eLearning designer to design/develop best media-items that serves learning objectives.


* Conduct quality assurance reviews to ensure accuracy, functionality, accessibility, user-friendly and adherence to company branding guidelines.


* Troubleshoot eLearning files extensions to sync with our LMS.


* Enhance existing e-learning courses and customize content to improve user experiences.


* Manage and maintain an e-learning content library.


* Meet project deadlines and work with eLearning designer to prioritize tasks.


* Stay up to date with emerging e-learning trends, technologies, and techniques.


**Requirements:**

* One (1) year of E-learning development experience is a Must.
* Proficient in Storyline Articulate 360, Adobe After Effects, Adobe Captivate, Adobe Primer, Camtasia, and Adobe Illustrator is a Must.
* Experience in applying instructional design theories such as ADDIE, SAM& Bloom's Taxonomy is a Must.
* Certified Instructional designer is preferred.
* Familiarity with SCORM, xAPI, and other e-learning standards *-file extensions-*.
* Strong communication and collaboration skills.
* Strong attention to detail and quality assurance
* Ability to work independently in a fast-paced environment and manage multiple projects simultaneously as part of a team.
* **Working** **conditions:**
* **Flexible in working in the US shift, 4 pm - 1 am Egypt time.**
* **Hybrid: 2 days onsite, and 3 remotely**
* **Location: Maadi**

*Important note:*

**Portfolio:** *Candidates are expected to send their Portfolio (Work samples)*


If you have a portfolio of e-learning projects you have developed, please upload it with your CV or send it to maha.shahein@f-g.com.

title: Backend Developer - Java
description:

 This is a pure backend and works primarily with Java and Kotlin.
   

  

**Your Profile (Must-have Requirements)**
* Practical experience of developing back-end services in Java and/or Kotlin.
* Focus on delivery, attention to detail and quality of the end result.
* Practical experience of designing, building and maintaining distributed systems in a cloud-native environment.
* Experience working in an agile development team, using common tools like Jira and GitHub.
* Examples of growing yourself and/or people around you – learning from others and sharing your knowledge, experiences and opinions.

**Application deadline:** 
 09-06-2025
   

  

**About Us**
 We currently employ experienced consultants in areas such as System Development, AI, Machine Learning, Testing, Cloud, Infra DevOps, and IT Project Management.

title: Full Stack Engineer
description:
**Role Overview:** 




 We are seeking an experienced Full Stack Developer to join our team in Stockholm, Sweden. This role requires strong hands-on experience in designing and building cloud-native applications using Microsoft Azure services and full stack technologies including Python, Java Spring Boot, MongoDB, and ReactJS.
 



  





**Key Responsibilities:** 



* Design and implement cloud-native applications using Azure services such as
 **Logic Apps, Function Apps, KeyVault, Blob Storage, and Table Storage** 
 .
* Develop and manage
 **CI/CD pipelines using Azure DevOps** 
 , deploying applications to
 **Kubernetes clusters** 
 .
* Build and maintain
 **Python Flask APIs** 
 , including support for
 **IFC model file parsing** 
 for product data integration.
* Design and manage scalable
 **NoSQL data models** 
 using
 **MongoDB Atlas (Cloud)** 
 .
* Develop robust
 **Java Spring Boot backend services** 
 , integrating with various cloud-native APIs.
* Create and maintain
 **real-time and batch API integrations** 
 with external systems to ensure consistent data flow.
* Implement and manage
 **webhooks** 
 for event-driven architecture using Azure-native or third-party services.
* Ensure secure communication and authentication using
 **JWT** 
 , integrated with
 **Azure Entra ID** 
 , and manage secrets via
 **Azure KeyVault** 
 .
* Collaborate closely with
 **cross-functional teams, product owners, and business stakeholders** 
 to define requirements and deliver scalable solutions.
* Leverage knowledge of the
 **telecommunications domain** 
 to handle product types, port structures, datasheets, and technical specifications.
* Work with
 **Azure Event Grid, Service Bus** 
 , or equivalent messaging services to enable asynchronous communication and decoupled architecture.
* Apply
 **microservices architecture principles** 
 to design modular, maintainable, and scalable systems.



  





**Essential Skills:** 



* **Cloud Platforms:** 
 Microsoft Azure (Logic Apps, Function Apps, Blob Storage, Table Storage, KeyVault, Event Grid, Service Bus)
* **CI/CD:** 
 Azure DevOps, Kubernetes
* **Programming Languages & Frameworks:** 
 Python (Flask), Java (Spring Boot), JavaScript (ReactJS)
* **Databases:** 
 MongoDB Atlas (Cloud-based NoSQL)
* **API Integration:** 
 RESTful APIs, Webhooks, Real-time and Batch Processing
* **Authentication & Security:** 
 JWT, Azure Entra ID, KeyVault
* **Architecture:** 
 Microservices, Distributed Systems
* **Domain Knowledge:** 
 Telecommunications – product structures, port configurations, and technical datasheets



  





**Desirable Competencies:** 



* Strong collaboration and stakeholder engagement skills
* Familiarity with event-driven architecture and asynchronous communication models
* Experience in handling IFC model files and product data modeling
* Agile development and DevOps best practices

title: Fullstack Developer
description:
At Ubiquiti Inc., we create technology platforms for Businesses, Smart Homes, and Internet Service Providers, driven by our goal to connect everyone, everywhere by Rethinking IT. To date, Ubiquiti has shipped over 100 million devices worldwide, from ISP networking products to next generation of IT solutions. At Ubiquiti, you’ll heighten your potential and broaden your horizons, while shaping the future of connectivity.
   

  

**We are currently looking for a highly skilled Fullstack Developer to our team in Stockholm, Sweden.**
***Please note that applicants must live in Sweden and hold a valid work permit at the time of application to be considered for this role.***
**Responsibilities**
* Develop and maintain highly reliable and scalable web services and UIs that serve millions of users worldwide, for example our platforms UniFi OS, Design Center/InnerSpace, UniFi Network, Accounts or Community
* Collaborate with developers and designers in distributed teams in an agile and fast-paced, international work environment
* Actively participate in projects and voice your ideas and solutions
* Maintain industry-standard programming style and stay up-to-date with the latest technologies and trends


**Requirements**
* Extensive experience of coding in modern JavaScript, TypeScript, React and Node.js
* Experience of building scalable and high-availability GraphQL/REST APIs and working with SQL databases (Postgres) and key-value stores/message brokers such as Redis
* Solid knowledge about programming, design patterns and web protocols
* Experience of debugging, profiling and optimising web apps
* Strong sense of ownership of tasks and responsibilities
* Ability to lead yourself and your own work as well as collaborate extensively with others
* Familiar with Git and Jira
* Excellent communication skills and highly proficient in English (written and spoken)


**Nice To Have**
* Skilled in Go and/or Java
* Experience developing AWS cloud services / DevOps
* Good understanding of networking protocols and architectures
* Familiarity with the agile software development processes


**Benefits**
* International work environment
* Competitive compensation package including wellness allowance, occupational pension, medical insurance, private health insurance, life insurance and work-injury insurance
* Five weeks of holiday per year
* Flexible work hours and hybrid work model
* Modern office space located in Epicenter (Hötorget)
* Access to all the latest Ubiquiti products and prototypes for home use and tests


***Please note that a background check will be conducted in the final stage of the recruitment process***

title: Jr Product Developer - Garments Womenswear
description:
**Job Description**
**WHAT YOU’LL DO**
 As a Jr Product Developer you will have an important role in the exciting and complex process of creating women’s collections with a focus on garments to be sold in all our sales countries – all over the world. Together with a tight team, you work with identifying and developing collections, according to current and upcoming global trends.
   

  

 Your main responsibility is to support the Product Developer, creating the best products to our customers. You will be the important link between designers, pattern makers and planners throughout the entire process and make things happen around you. We therefore think that you are a true star when it comes to administrative tasks and sample handling, and love to work in a fast-paced environment where no day is the same. Here you will get the chance to be part of daily operational tasks and learn from experienced colleagues.
   

  

**Who You Are**
 We are looking for people with experience from:
   

  

* Degree within textile and/or product development and/or similar
* Working as a Junior Buyer or Junior Product Developer
* Have passion for women’s customer and current fashion products
* Experience and competence within product development
* Driven and ambitious
* Strong salesmanship and see opportunities for growth and profitability
* Being structured, organized and take initiatives
* Being a team player with a flexible attitude
* See possibilities, improvements, and simple solutions


**Who We Are**
 At the Womenswear Assortment, you will be part of a fast-paced environment and work with garments in a current assortment for our customer – always with focus on quality, sustainability, and the best price. Womenswear consists of the following categories: jersey & knit, light & heavy woven, underwear, loungewear, nightwear, and swimwear. You will contribute to making progress towards our vision – A loved women´s fashion destination, leading the change to a sustainable fashion future.
   

  

**JOIN US**
 We are recruiting to fill several full time positions with placement in Stockholm and start as soon as possible. If you feel your experience, skills and ambitions are right for this role, please send your application including CV
 **latest 17th of June** 
 . Interviews will be held continuously. (For internal candidates, please initiate a dialogue with your manager before applying.)
   

  

**Benefits:**
 We offer all our employees at H&M Group attractive benefits with extensive development opportunities around the globe. All our employees receive a staff discount card, usable on all our H&M Group brands in stores and online. Brands covered by the discount are H&M (Beauty and Move included), COS, Weekday, Monki, H&M HOME, & Other Stories, ARKET. In addition to our staff discount, all our employees are included in our H&M Incentive Program – HIP.
   

  

 In addition to our global benefits, all our local markets offer different competitive perks and benefits. Please note that they may differ between employment type and countries.
   

  

**Inclusion & Diversity:**
 H&M is a part of H&M Group. At H&M Group, we’re determined to create and maintain inclusive, diverse and equitable workplaces throughout our organisation. Our teams should consist of a variety of people that share and combine their knowledge, experience and ideas. Having a diverse workforce leads to a positive impact on how we address challenges, on what we perceive possible and on how we choose to relate to our colleagues and customers all over the world. Hence all diversity dimensions are taken into consideration in our recruitment process.
   

  

*We strive to have a fair and equal process and therefore kindly ask you not to attach a cover letter in your application as they often contain information that easily can trigger unintentional biases.*
 We look forward to hearing from you!

title: Senior Java Software Engineer
description:
A rapidly growing fintech company is developing a next-generation spend management and payment solution aimed at streamlining business finances and removing manual processes. With a growing footprint across the Nordics and an expanding user base, the company is set for continued growth. Operating with a tech-driven, product-focused mindset, the engineering team is encouraged to build scalable, innovative solutions using modern technologies and agile workflows.

This role offers the chance to contribute to product architecture and direction while building backend business logic and APIs in Java. You’ll also work with CI/CD pipelines and modern cloud infrastructure to help shape and deliver new solutions from the ground up.

 Java, MongoDB, MySQL, Redis, AWS, Docker, CircleCI
